attributes.action: Urgently improve the A 14 road and impose 50 mph speed restrictions between Newmarket and Huntingdon in both directions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The A 14 dual carriageway needs urgent
improvements.   There are too many access and egress locations which combine to create dangerous risks of
serious accidents, when almost all
heavy goods vehicles are being driven
in excess of the legal 50 mph limit.
At motorway speed limits on this very
congested road the drivers of HGVs are
putting the lives of all other A14
users at risk.    Experience has shown
that this road is possibly the most
dangerous in this country.
